org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.classpath

Class AbstractClassPathProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.classpath.AbstractClassPathProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassPathProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassPathProviderImpl, MultiModuleClassPathProvider

    public abstract class AbstractClassPathProvider
extends Object
implements ClassPathProvider
    The base class for implementation of ClassPathProvider.
    Since:
    1.99

      Event listener interface for being notified of changes in the set of projects paths.

public abstract ClassPath[] getProjectClassPaths(@NonNull
                                                               String type)
        Returns ClassPaths of given type owned by the project.

        Returns:

      • getPropertyName

        @CheckForNull
public abstract String[] getPropertyName(@NonNull
                                                       SourceGroup sg,
                                                       @NonNull
                                                       String type)
        Returns the names of path properties storing the path type for given SourceGroup.
        Parameters:
        sg - the SourceGroup to return the properties for
        type - the ClassPath type
        Returns:
        the property names or null when the type is not supported or given SourceGroup is unknown.
        Since:
        1.113

      • addClassPathsChangeListener

        public final void addClassPathsChangeListener(@NonNull
                                              AbstractClassPathProvider.ClassPathsChangeListener listener)
        Adds the AbstractClassPathProvider.ClassPathsChangeListener. The AbstractClassPathProvider.ClassPathsChangeListener is notified when a set of project ClassPaths is changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add.

      • removeClassPathsChangeListener

        public final void removeClassPathsChangeListener(@NonNull
                                                 AbstractClassPathProvider.ClassPathsChangeListener listener)
        Removes the AbstractClassPathProvider.ClassPathsChangeListener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove.

                                          Collection<? extends String> changedClassPathTypes)
